涅.definition: (literary) alunite (formerly used as a black dye); (literary) to dye black

涅槃.definition: (Buddhism) to achieve nirvana (extinction of desire and pain); to die (loanword from Sanskrit, abbr. for 涅槃那[nie4pan2na4])

涅瓦.definition: the Nyeva or Neva river (through St Petersburg)

涅瓦河.definition: Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
